About Us

We provide premium tourism services to our clients, teaching groups, as well as individuals about the various benefits of traveling/ through experience rather than reading from a book.

What's Erekere About?

Erekere is a Nigerian tour operating company that promotes African tourism and connects people. We organise group tours, school excursions, corporate retreats, holiday packages and also offer tour guide services within Africa, to educate people about the beauty within. We organise affordable tours to encourage Nigerians and even foreigners to explore our rich and diverse cultural heritage as well as our enthralling and beautiful landscapes.

Our Mission

  • To be a reliable tourism brand that offers luxury experience at pocket friendly prices.
  • To create awareness to Nigerians and Foreigners alike, about the the beauty and richness of the Nigerian Culture and the need to develop and improve upon what we already have.

Our Vision

  • To curate experiences that linger for either groups and individuals
  • To help Nigerians understand and appreciate what this country has to offer by improving domestic tourism and Increasing the level of Cultural enlightenment.
